Title: 1.1 Requirement Gathering & Interviews
Body:
Description:
Conduct interviews with radiologists and sonographers to gather functional requirements. Section: SRS – Software Requirements Specification; Phase: Product Definition

Acceptance Criteria:
- 10+ user interviews conducted
- Documented feature list in PRD
- Initial MVP defined

Title: 1.2 PRD Drafting
Body:
Description:
Compile requirements into a Product Requirement Document. Section: SRS; Phase: Product Definition

Acceptance Criteria:
- PRD includes features, users, constraints, scope
- Reviewed by stakeholders

Title: 2.1 Wireframe Design
Body:
Description:
Design wireframes for desktop and mobile UI. Section: System Architecture Overview; Phase: UI/UX Design

Acceptance Criteria:
- Wireframes approved by 3–5 medical professionals
- Interactive prototype ready in Figma

Title: 2.2 UI Mockups & Feedback
Body:
Description:
Prepare final UI mockups and gather feedback from doctors. Section: System Architecture Overview; Phase: UI/UX Design

Acceptance Criteria:
- Mockups reviewed and approved
- Feedback incorporated into design

Title: 3.1 Kubernetes Cluster Setup
Body:
Description:
Provision a managed Kubernetes cluster (AWS EKS/GKE) or local cluster (kind/minikube). Section: System Architecture Overview; Phase: Tech Selection & Architecture

Acceptance Criteria:
- kubectl access works
- Cluster nodes are healthy and Ready
- Setup documented in repo

Title: 3.2 Helm & CI/CD Pipeline Preparation
Body:
Description:
Install Helm and prepare initial CI/CD pipeline templates for microservices deployment. Section: MLOps & DevOps Requirements; Phase: Tech Selection & Architecture

Acceptance Criteria:
- Helm installed and functional
- CI/CD templates ready for FastAPI and Frontend services
- Deployment pipeline documented

Title: 4.1 Patient Management Microservice
Body:
Description:
Develop backend microservice for patient records CRUD. Section: Functional Requirements; Phase: MVP Development

Acceptance Criteria:
- Endpoints functional and tested
- Integration test with PostgreSQL passes
- Swagger documentation complete

Title: 4.2 Speech-to-Text Microservice Integration
Body:
Description:
Integrate STT engine (Whisper/Google) for real-time dictation. Section: Functional Requirements; Phase: MVP Development

Acceptance Criteria:
- Audio processed and converted to text
- Error rate <5% medical terms
- Logs stored in MongoDB

Title: 4.3 Report Generation Microservice
Body:
Description:
Develop service to generate structured reports from STT output. Section: Functional Requirements; Phase: MVP Development

Acceptance Criteria:
- Reports generated correctly
- Export PDF and structured format
- Integration test passed

Title: 5.1 DICOM Storage & Indexing
Body:
Description:
Setup AWS S3 buckets and indexing pipeline for DICOM images. Section: Data Management Requirements; Phase: MVP Development

Acceptance Criteria:
- DICOM upload succeeds
- Metadata indexed in PostgreSQL
- Role-based access control works

Title: 5.2 Event Streaming Setup
Body:
Description:
Configure Kafka topics for patient data, reports, and STT events. Section: Data Management Requirements; Phase: MVP Development

Acceptance Criteria:
- Topics created and accessible
- End-to-end producer/consumer test passes
- Documentation updated

Title: 5.3 Data Backup & Encryption
Body:
Description:
Implement backup strategy and encryption for all patient data. Section: Data Management Requirements; Phase: MVP Development

Acceptance Criteria:
- Scheduled backups verified
- Data encrypted at rest and in transit
- Restore tested

Title: 6.1 Compliance Audit & Documentation
Body:
Description:
Prepare HIPAA/GDPR compliance documentation. Section: Compliance & Regulatory Requirements; Phase: Compliance & Release Prep

Acceptance Criteria:
- Audit logs enabled
- Encryption verified
- Documentation approved by QA/legal team

Title: 6.2 Security Testing
Body:
Description:
Perform penetration testing and security audit. Section: Compliance & Regulatory Requirements; Phase: Compliance & Release Prep

Acceptance Criteria:
- All critical vulnerabilities resolved
- Security report approved

Title: 7.1 Prometheus & Grafana Setup
Body:
Description:
Deploy Prometheus & Grafana to monitor microservices and STT pipeline. Section: Monitoring & Observability; Phase: Testing & Iteration

Acceptance Criteria:
- Metrics visible for all microservices
- Alerts configured
- Dashboards documented

Title: 7.2 Logging & Alerting
Body:
Description:
Implement centralized logging and alerting system. Section: Monitoring & Observability; Phase: Testing & Iteration

Acceptance Criteria:
- Logs collected
- Alerts sent on failures
- Documentation complete

Title: 8.1 AI Image Analysis Service
Body:
Description:
Build containerized AI microservice for ultrasound image analysis. Section: Advanced Features Development; Phase: Post-release

Acceptance Criteria:
- Model deployed in Kubernetes
- Feature pipeline tested
- Fine-tuned model accuracy meets threshold

Title: 8.2 Multi-language Support Implementation
Body:
Description:
Implement multilingual support for reports and UI. Section: Functional Requirements / Advanced Features; Phase: Post-release

Acceptance Criteria:
- English, Persian, and other languages selectable
- UI displays correctly
- Reports exported in selected language

Title: 8.3 Advanced Reporting Features
Body:
Description:
Develop automatic report formatting and template system. Section: Advanced Features Development; Phase: Post-release

Acceptance Criteria:
- Reports automatically formatted
- Templates applied correctly
- Export functions work

Title: 8.4 AI Model Monitoring & Retraining Pipeline
Body:
Description:
Implement monitoring and retraining pipeline for AI models. Section: MLOps & DevOps Requirements / Advanced Features Development; Phase: Post-release

Acceptance Criteria:
- AI model performance monitored
- Retraining pipeline operational
- Metrics tracked in Grafana/Prometheus

Title: 9.1 Production Deployment & Environment Setup
Body:
Description: 
Deploy all microservices, databases, and AI pipelines to the production environment. Section: Deployment & Maintenance; Phase: Post-release 

Acceptance Criteria: 
- Services running in production 
- Environment variables configured correctly 
- Deployment scripts tested

Title: 9.2 Performance Optimization
Body:
Description: 
Optimize backend and AI services for latency, throughput, and resource usage. Section: Maintenance & Performance; Phase: Post-release 

Acceptance Criteria: 
- Response time <500ms for main endpoints 
- CPU/memory usage within thresholds 
- Load testing completed

Title: 9.3 Post-release QA & Bug Fixes
Body:
Description: 
Perform QA testing on production system and fix post-release bugs. Section: Maintenance & QA; Phase: Post-release 

Acceptance Criteria: 
- Critical and high-priority bugs resolved 
- Regression testing passed 
- QA report approved

Title: 9.4 User Training & Documentation
Body:
Description: 
Prepare user manuals, release notes, and training sessions for clinical staff. Section: Documentation & Training; Phase: Post-release 

Acceptance Criteria: 
- User guides completed 
- Training sessions held with staff 
- Feedback incorporated into docs

Title: 9.5 Monitoring & Incident Response Setup
Body:
Description: 
Configure monitoring, alerting, and incident response procedures for production. Section: MLOps & DevOps; Phase: Post-release 

Acceptance Criteria: 
- Prometheus/Grafana dashboards configured 
- Alerts triggered correctly 
- Incident playbooks documented

Title: 10.1 Feature Enhancements
Body:
Description: 
Implement new features based on user feedback and roadmap. Section: Post-release Enhancements; Phase: Maintenance 

Acceptance Criteria: 
- Features deployed successfully 
- Unit and integration tests passed 
- Feedback tracked and documented

Title: 10.2 Bug Fixes & Patches
Body:
Description: 
Fix bugs reported by users after release. Section: Maintenance; Phase: Post-release 

Acceptance Criteria: 
- Bugs resolved in staging and production 
- Regression tests completed 
- Users notified of fixes

Title: 10.3 Minor UI Improvements
Body:
Description: 
Polish UI based on user feedback. Section: Frontend Maintenance; Phase: Post-release 

Acceptance Criteria: 
- UI polished and consistent 
- Accessibility improvements applied 
- UI tests passed

Title: 10.4 AI Model Improvements
Body:
Description: 
Update AI/ML models based on new training data and clinical feedback. Section: AI/ML Maintenance; Phase: Post-release 

Acceptance Criteria: 
- Model retrained successfully 
- Metrics improved or maintained 
- Model deployed to production

Title: 10.5 Metrics & Logging Enhancements
Body:
Description: 
Extend monitoring and logging for new features and AI pipelines. Section: DevOps & MLOps; Phase: Post-release 

Acceptance Criteria: 
- Logs collected for all new services 
- Metrics dashboards updated 
- Alerts configured

Title: 11.1 Security Audit & Updates
Body:
Description: 
Conduct security audit, apply patches, and update access controls. Section: Compliance & Security; Phase: Maintenance 

Acceptance Criteria: 
- Vulnerabilities resolved 
- Penetration tests passed 
- Access permissions verified

Title: 11.2 Backup & Disaster Recovery
Body:
Description: 
Verify backup procedures and disaster recovery plans. Section: DevOps & Compliance; Phase: Maintenance 

Acceptance Criteria: 
- Backups completed and verified 
- Recovery drills successful 
- Documentation updated

Title: 11.3 SLA & Uptime Monitoring
Body:
Description: 
Implement SLA tracking and uptime monitoring for enterprise clients. Section: Monitoring & Compliance; Phase: Maintenance 

Acceptance Criteria: 
- SLA metrics collected automatically 
- Alerts on SLA breaches 
- Reports available for stakeholders

Title: 11.4 Logging & Audit Trail Improvements
Body:
Description: 
Enhance logging and audit trails for regulatory compliance. Section: Compliance & DevOps; Phase: Maintenance 

Acceptance Criteria: 
- All critical actions logged 
- Audit trails accessible 
- Logs stored securely

Title: 11.5 Patch Management
Body:
Description: 
Apply software patches and updates to all environments. Section: Maintenance & Operations; Phase: Post-release 

Acceptance Criteria: 
- All patches applied without downtime 
- Regression tests completed 
- Documentation updated

Title: 12.1 Analytics & Reporting Improvements
Body:
Description: 
Enhance reporting pipeline with analytics dashboards and additional metrics. Section: Advanced Features; Phase: Maintenance 

Acceptance Criteria: 
- Dashboards show updated metrics 
- Reports export correctly 
- System load within thresholds

Title: 12.2 AI Model Retraining
Body:
Description: 
Retrain AI models with new data collected from production usage. Section: AI/ML Maintenance; Phase: Post-release Acceptance Criteria: - Model retraining completed without errors - Performance metrics meet thresholds - Models deployed to production

Title: 12.3 Data Quality & Validation
Body:
Description: 
Validate incoming production data and ensure high data quality. Section: Data Management; Phase: Maintenance 

Acceptance Criteria: 
- Data validation rules applied 
- Invalid data flagged and corrected 
- Reports show quality metrics

Title: 12.4 Feedback Loop Integration
Body:
Description: 
Integrate user feedback into development backlog for continuous improvement. Section: Product & Maintenance; Phase: Post-release Acceptance Criteria: - Feedback collected and analyzed - Feature requests prioritized - Actionable items documented

Title: 12.5 Regression Testing
Body:
Description: 
Perform periodic regression testing to ensure stability of the system. Section: QA & Maintenance; Phase: Post-release 

Acceptance Criteria: 
- Regression tests run for all critical services 
- Bugs reported and fixed 
- Test reports documented

Title: 13.1 Feature Flag Implementation
Body:
Description: 
Implement feature flags for safe rollout of new functionality. Section: DevOps / Backend; Phase: Maintenance 

cceptance Criteria: 
- Feature flags controllable per environment 
- Rollback possible without downtime 
- Logging of flag usage implemented

Title: 13.2 System Health Dashboard
Body:
Description: 
Create dashboard for overall system health monitoring. Section: DevOps & Monitoring; Phase: Maintenance 

Acceptance Criteria: 
- Key metrics visible 
- Alerts configured for critical thresholds 
- Dashboard accessible to ops team

Title: 13.3 API Versioning & Deprecation
Body:
Description: 
Implement API versioning and deprecation policies. Section: Backend Maintenance; Phase: Post-release 

Acceptance Criteria: 
- Old APIs maintained until deprecation 
- New APIs documented 
- Clients informed of changes

Title: 13.4 Security Patches & Updates
Body:
Description: 
Apply security patches and update dependencies regularly. Section: Security & DevOps; Phase: Maintenance 

Acceptance Criteria: 
- Dependencies updated 
- Vulnerabilities fixed 
- Security report generated

Title: 13.5 Logging & Observability Enhancements
Body:
Description: 
Improve logging, metrics, and observability across all services. Section: DevOps & Monitoring; Phase: Maintenance 

Acceptance Criteria: 
- Logs consolidated 
- Metrics dashboards updated 
- Alerts fine-tuned

Title: 14.1 Multi-language Report Updates
Body:
Description: 
Expand multi-language support for additional languages. Section: Frontend / Advanced Features; Phase: Post-release 

Acceptance Criteria: 
- New languages selectable in UI 
- Reports export correctly in selected language 
- Localization verified by QA

Title: 14.2 Accessibility Improvements
Body:
Description: 
Improve UI accessibility for clinical staff. Section: Frontend / Usability; Phase: Maintenance 

Acceptance Criteria: 
- Screen reader compatibility 
- High-contrast mode implemented 
- User testing feedback incorporated

Title: 14.3 UI/UX Enhancements
Body:
Description: 
Apply UI/UX improvements based on user feedback and analytics. Section: Frontend / Design; Phase: Post-release 

Acceptance Criteria: 
- Improvements implemented 
- Usability tested 
- Stakeholder approval obtained

Title: 14.4 Reporting Feature Enhancements
Body:
Description: 
Add new report templates and export options. Section: Advanced Features; Phase: Maintenance Acceptance Criteria: - Templates implemented - Export functions tested - User feedback incorporated

Title: 14.5 User Management Enhancements
Body:
Description: 
Improve user roles, permissions, and management features. Section: Backend / Compliance; Phase: Maintenance 

Acceptance Criteria: 
- Roles configurable 
- Permissions enforced 
- Admin panel updated

Title: 15.1 SLA & Metrics Reporting
Body:
Description: 
Implement Service Level Agreement tracking and reporting for enterprise clients. Section: DevOps & Compliance; Phase: Maintenance 

Acceptance Criteria: 
- SLA metrics collected automatically 
- Reports generated for stakeholders 
- Alerts on SLA breaches

Title: 15.2 Continuous Improvement & Feedback Loop
Body:
Description: 
Collect feedback, review performance, and plan next improvements. Section: Product & Maintenance; Phase: Post-release 

Acceptance Criteria: 
- Feedback collected from users and stakeholders 
- Metrics analyzed for improvements 
- Next release plan drafted
